title: Child adopted out
childQuestion: Did {deceasedName} legally adopt you out of their family (give you up for adoption)?

wholeBloodSiblingQuestion: Did your parents legally adopt you out of their family (give you up for adoption)?
halfBloodSiblingQuestion: Did the parent you have in common with {deceasedName} legally adopt you out of their family (give you up for adoption)?
